nodes.text: Sodarra was an Imperial captain who recovered Darth Vader's wrecked ship on Vaal in the aftermath of the Battle of Yavin.

While under pursuit from Governal-General Nox Vellam in their corvette, they were rescued by the smugglers Han Solo and Chewbacca. Sodarra fed them a story of being on the run after stealing a prototype cloaking device; however, Solo eventually discovered Vader's cockpit. After heading to Tatooine and rescuing Princess Leia, Sodarra and the smugglers went their separate ways, with the Imperials unloading Vader.
Sodarra first appeared in the choose-your-own adventure book Scoundrel's Luck, written by Troy Denning and published by West End Games.
In several of the "bad" endings, it is possible to get Sodarra killed.
